src:
Gantikan Granit Xhaka, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang Jadi Kapten Baru Arsenal
06 Nov 2019, 04:14 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang kini resmi menyandang ban kapten utama tim Arsenal menggantikan Granit Xhaka. Hal tersebut dikonfirmasi langsung oleh manajer Unai Emery.
Jabatan kapten utama Arsenal menjadi perbincangan hangat setelah Xhaka membalas cemoohan para suporter padanya dalam laga kontra Crystal Palace pekan lalu.
Emery pun kemudian memutuskan untuk mengistirahatkan Xhaka dalam laga kontra Liverpool dan Wolverhampton Wanderers. Kini ia juga tak masuk dalam skuat untuk laga melawan Vitoria Guimaraes.
text:
Replace Granite Xhaka, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang Becomes Arsenal's New Captain
Nov 6 2019, 04:14 by Bola.net
Soccer - Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang now officially bears the Arsenal team's first armband to replace Granit Xhaka. This was confirmed directly by the manager of Unai Emery.
The position of Arsenal's chief captain became a heated conversation after Xhaka returned the supporters' scorn for him in the match against Crystal Palace last week.
Emery then decided to rest Xhaka in a match against Liverpool and Wolverhampton Wanderers. Now he is also not included in the squad for the match against Vitoria Guimaraes.
